entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @RyanAFournier Yes, bcuz ur orange messiah is endangering lives by suggesting chloroquine & hydroxychloroquine are ok for COVID-19 patients, which it has NOT been approved by FDA for! Ppl are buying the drugs, making it impossible for those who need it to get it! Stop giving partial facts!
